name: Burger
description: A delicious burger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion on a toasted bun.

name: Pizza
description: A classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni.

name: Taco
description: A crispy corn tortilla filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and salsa.

name: Sushi
description: A plate of assorted sushi rolls, including California rolls, tuna rolls, and salmon rolls.

name: Pad Thai
description: A stir-fried noodle dish with chicken, shrimp, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a sweet and savory sauce.

name: Fried Chicken
description: Crispy and juicy fried chicken served with mashed potatoes, gravy, and a biscuit.

name: Burrito
description: A large flour tortilla filled with rice, beans, seasoned ground beef, cheese, and salsa.

name: Pho
description: A Vietnamese soup with rice noodles, beef broth, sliced beef, and herbs.

name: Pasta
description: Spaghetti with meatballs and marinara sauce, topped with grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy fried fish served with French fries and tartar sauce.
